data.text: @GTRoberts @notinproportion @publicaddress Is it the gov’t’s job to keep risk as low as possible at any cost?

@GTRoberts @publicaddress Since when is the only job of the media to empathise and ignoring false equivalence!?

I get so tired of listening to interviews that never ask the obvious questions that put things in context or show the super obvious flaw in an opinion etc
@notinproportion @publicaddress The media also hasn't explained the actions the Gov is elected to do, which is to keep risk as low as possible and to keep people healthy, and alive!
